content.detailedDescription:
i was watching local fireworks. noticed a bright orange light traveling east to west paralleling southern state parkway. i thought was a firework gone bad. but it kept a steady course and a descending altitude. moments after the first orb went behind a treeline two more appeared to come from the same area as the first. they went behind the trees in the same place. two more came from the southeast but disappeared. six came from the south moments later in two groups of three 4-5 minutes apart. the lead orb traveled north until i lost sight of it. the two behind it appeared to merge into one and just vanished as they got close to my location, they were about at about 1000 feet altitude and 1500 away to my ssw.  the second group stayed in a triangular formation at a constant speed and altitude and continued to fly north until the were out of sight. all the orbs seemed to fly ate the same speed (about 100 - 120), never a sound of engines.
 this happened on central long island. there is significant air traffic in the area. these were not typical craft. no engine sounds, no navigation lights, not drones, helicopters or fixed wing aircraft. there were no trails or smoke. when they went below the trees there was no sound of impact and no flash or explosion. when i was observing the orbs coming from the south i saw at least two commercial aircraft leaving islip macarthur airport change course, this never happens. they always follow similar flight paths, they seemed to be taking evasive actions.
i was curious and observant, as is my nature.  i am  former lrrp and intel analyst. i went into the mode when this started. this was also witnessed by many neighbors.
 i know orb sighting are or were common around the old nuclear power plant not far from here, this is a first for this general area that i know of.  not my first sighting.
some neighbors took photos which i have access to if you want them.
content.summary: Multiple orbs from 3 directions with common destination

content.detailedDescription: My fiancee, son, daughter, my fiancee's grandmother and myself were outside of our grandmother's house saying good-bye. it was around 9:15pm july4th 2015, we were going to go up the road and watch the fire works display. we had heard a few people already lighting some off in the distance. it was almost dark, but still light in the sky. as we were getting into the car something caught my eye. it looked like what i thought was a firework going up in the sky, but it never exploded, it did not burn out. it just stayed there, moving towards us. it looked like an orange flame. it was not the light from an air plane or a helicopter, the house is near to an airport, we know what those kind of air craft look like. we all saw it, not one of us knew what it was. it was a flame, a glowing orange flame moving towards us. then it stopped moving. it looked as if it was flickering off and on, just like a candle flame would do, if a gust of wind were hitting it. after about five minutes, i watched as it just vanished. if it were a fire work, it would have either exploded, or fizzled back down. this thing stayed in the sky, a bright orange flickering flame. it looked as if it were an egg shape, but the top was more of a point. our grandmother is the wife of a retired marine, she even had no idea what it was. i felt baffled. i honestly have no idea what i saw. i am not saying it was little green men, or even if it was other worldly, but it was something i have never seen before, and that i have no logical way to say what it was.
content.summary: It looked like a flame, like an orange flame in the sky, it vanished, it was there for about 5 mins, then vanished right before my eyes

content.detailedDescription: On the fourth of july, on approximately 9:30 pm at night, while the fireworks were being blown, we witnessed a weird entity in the the sky and it was moving up and down in one direction until disappearing without a trace. about 4 times in a row within 5 minutes of each other until the 4 time we witnessed it flew away at high speed into the sky but before it flew away we took a few picture to make sure we were believing about what we where seeing and when we tried to turn on the computer and it started to mess up and restarted multiple times but finally when we got it to work, we zoomed in the picture and witness a flying saucer...
content.summary: We saw it flying and while fire works was going off during the fouth of july

content.detailedDescription: On 7/4/15 at 9:15pm standing in driveway awating start of fireworks display from nearby field, myself, my mother and father all witnessed an orange orb travel from north east direction to north west in horizontal line, then reaching an area where it traveled directly straight up till light became faint and shut off.  after awaiting 5 min, the light was again seen taking the same path, there were other airplanes in vicinity well above the level of the object which were noticable as planes due to lighting pattern on the object,  no sound was heard from the orbs.  after second orange orb disappeared, noticed a red orb directly in front of my line of sight as fireworks display ongoing, hovering in place for 5-6 min, then it instantly began to travel in a westerly direction and abruptly stopped.  hovered for another 2 min, then traveeled in a 90 degree angle from initial trajectory to due north till out of eye line.  10 min after noticed 3 more instances of orange orbs completing similar trajectory as first 2.   looking about, noticed 2 green lights from directly down the block off to the east above tree line, they were coming directly down the block, my father and i walked to middle of street to see it better the lights immediately stopped and hovered, as it hovered the green lights independently of each other began to swivel and turn from green to red and back to green  it then descended very slowly till went behind tree line.  these objects were visible by naked eye, no actual structure was seen, it was just pure light.  looked at them through binoculars, but still no structure was seen only pure light.  there was no sound associated with the lights but sound was heard from the planes passing by while observing these lights.  all witnesses are adults, above 40, no alcohol was consumed prior to observation.  this was our first ever witnessing an event like this which is completely confounding us.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Multiple orbs of light traveling over head at various times over a 90 min period

content.detailedDescription: While watching the last 15 minutes of the 4th of july fireworks from my driveway i saw an orangish red glowing orb slowly moving from the northeast to the southwest between the tree line. i pointed it out to my wife and she wasn't sure what it was. a few minutes another orb slowly traveled the same path between the tree line. after the fireworks were over we started to cleaning up our chairs and bringing them in the house. as i was in my house my wife bursts through the door and yelled " come quick and take a look at this". as me, my sister, brother-in-law and wife ran outside i could see another orb moving across the tree line path. when my brother-in law reached for his phone to take a picture the orb moved fast to the west and disappeared from sight. i asked my wife what she saw and see said she saw 4 orangish orbs moving across the tree line. she was not sure how they were moving so close together.
content.summary: Witnessed multiple orange orbs during and after 4th of july fireworks.

content.detailedDescription: My family and i were in the backyard observing the july 4th fireworks display.  while i was looking up i noticed a "star" moving quite quickly in the sky in a se direction.  i observed it for about 10 seconds to acknowledge if it was just a plane flying high overhead, but the object was solid white (looked like the planet venus, only it was moving).  it was hard to tell exactly how high it was but i would guess a good 3-5 miles high. i then came to the assumption it was probably the international space station flying overhead as i have seen it fly by plenty of times.  i motioned for my family members to check it out and in the 5 seconds i took my eyes off the object it had completely changed direction 180 degrees and proceeded to take a straight nw path.  the speed had to be incredible because it went from being straight overhead to zipping off into the horizon in about 15 seconds.
content.summary: Thought it was the iss, until it changed 180 degree direction and was moving way too fast

content.detailedDescription: I was told they might have been chinese lanterns, but i'm really doubtful of that theory. it is possible and would like to know if anyone in or close to my area had been releasing them. i had mentally asked for a sighting, two years ago larger objects appeared in the same location and only two days after july. when i looked out my window i saw this formation, an orb above and one below the other. they ascended slowly and then i noticed they continued to appear, one after the other, at times two together. they wobbled and even shot side to side at times. i was ecstatic when i noticed them. they glided off to the north east until they could no longer be seen and they all followed the same path.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Nine orange orbs over new castle

content.detailedDescription: July 4thy boyfriend and i went to see fire works on our way home we witnessed strange lights moving in the sky for approximately 15 to 20 minutes at about 11:00pm they slowed and descended  as they passed over us then rapidly disappeared we followed the direction we thought they we're moving  which led us to late ontario where we witnessed one more of the reddish orange object
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Witnessed strange light in sky reddish orange light coming from ufo then multiples of the same as well as smaller white orb shapes on triangular pattern

content.detailedDescription: We were at the lewisville square fireworks and on the way walking back to husband's grandmother's house walking down styersferry rd. we saw a purple blueis light in the sky, to low to be a plane and it was hovering. to small to be a basic drone and also no helacopter noise. as we got closer to his grandmas house the we came closer to the light. other people were shocked to see it and wondered what it was. on thr way back we noticed about 10-15 people we know saw it. the fireworks started their finish , and the light started flashing red lights instead of the blue green purple, then it went back to those, and then back to red. right as the fireworks finished up it turned blue then started heading east at a slow to normal speed. i reported this as ufo because of characteristics and how it does not match with helacopter or drone. i would like to know if anyone else saw this or if someone has insight on it. so crazy !!! 8o
content.summary: Colored lights big like size of car, blue green, no sound

content.detailedDescription:
After seeing three orbs last year during the evening 4th of july fireworks displayed i invited a friend over for viewing this year in case the orbs returned. they did return. the entire experience was the same as last year except there were 16 objects this year, last year only 3.  (last years experience is on file with mufon) flight path was from the north to the north west in a lateral path well above the tree line. (roughly over i-71). (same as last year.)
each orb flew in a direct line, not floating or wavering. it obviously was not fireworks. neither was it chinese lanterns. the flying objects were reddish-orange and bright. difficult to tell how far off they were or what exact height . entire duration of event was maybe an hour and 20 minutes with a single orb appearing in the sky then followed by the next maybe 4 or 5 minutes apart. never more than three in the sky at any given time. sometimes a lapse of 10 minutes or so between some sightings. orbs looked to be flying under their own power rather than the winds. the event was witnessed from a third floor balcony under cloudy conditions. mostly two witnesses for most of the event but once as many as 6 people witnessed.
content.summary: During the time between 9:15 pm and 10:30pm (approx)we witnessed 16. different orbs originating in the northern sky, fly in a fairly flat, lateral path well above the tree line . path direction was north to north west.

content.detailedDescription: I was on the second floor of my house, in my meditation room preparing to meditate. i was looking out my southern facing window to see if i was going to catch any fireworks going off. i noticed 3 lights in a tight v formation, one red, blue, and green. at first i thought it was a plane but it was moving way to slow to be a plane. i next thought it might be a helicopter but if it were i should have been able to hear it, but all i heard was the occasional boom of a firework going off. i moved from the couch i was sitting on to the window to get a better look. i suddenly thought "if this is a ufo i want you to stop and hover", which it then did. at this point i started reaching back for my phone i'd left on the couch. as soon as i did the lights started moving forward again. i immediately thought "no, don't go. i'll stop reaching for my phone.", but it kept going slowly forward and started fading out. i felt as if it knew i wanted to get a picture or video of it and it didn't want me to.
content.summary: 3 lights moving in straight line, stopped to hover, started moving again, faded away.

content.detailedDescription:
I went outside with our 2 dogs so they could perform their nightly "duties".  i usually take my phone with me in case they decide to dawdle, but since fireworks were going off i didn't anticipate either of them being out very long, so i unfortunately did not have it with me.  

less than a minute after i went out, i observed the first of the objects moving slowly from roughly ne to a southerly direction while looking up for fireworks.  it was not traveling in a straight line, but rather a somewhat meandering path.  the object did seem to favor turning toward its left (my right) more than any other direction.  on 2 occasions during my first sighting, it appeared to emit either flames or sparks from what i can only assume would be the rear of it (it could have been the bottom, as none of the objects ever got close enough to view any type of definite shape). the emissions only lasted for at most 3 seconds, and they reminded me very much of the "trails" left behind while someone is welding, with pieces of glowing metal staying lit slightly longer than the sparks from the weld itself.

when i first sighted it, i assumed it was nothing more than a roman candle or some such type of firework, but i immediately discounted that when the light neither faded nor moved toward the ground in a downward arc.  my next thought was a helicopter, but i've heard them fly overhead many times before and even with all the noise from the fireworks around me, i could not discern any sound from the object. 

by this time, the object seemed to speed up a bit while moving over the roof of our home, so i immediately took the dogs in and called for my fiancee.  she arrived a few seconds later, and when i went into the backyard in an attempt to reacquire sight of the object, i was unable to see it.  i started around the side of the house for a better view of the southern sky when she called to me from the back porch.  she had sighted not only 1 but 3 identical objects - one at a heading (that i confirmed after the sighting was over via my phone's compass) of roughly 290 degress magnetic, while the other 2 seemed to be much closer to each other at approximately 310 degrees magnetic.  one of those objects seemed to be slightly lower an to my right of it's mate, but since they were apparently very far away i was unable to determine if that was actually the case or if one of them was simply lower to the horizon than the other. it may have been possible that these were 3 additional objects from my original sighting as i have no way of knowing if my initial object circled around to join the "group".

i immediately ran inside to grab my phone, but by the time i got back outside 2 of those 3 objects had vanished.  my fiancee verified the flames/sparks that i observed - they came out of each of these new objects, but not in unison. i originally got some still shots using my "perfectly clear" app on my phone, but then realized that app does not shoot video, so i had to switch over to the stock android camera app for that.  i was not sure if the videos were actually being shot, so that is why i have multiple videos before the final one.  just as with the other 2 objects she observed, the final one either ascended into the sky until it was no longer visible or the light slowly faded on it.  

a few final observations: while taking the stills and videos i thought they might be drones of some sort (i own one myself), however i have yet to see one that's capable of carrying a payload that would emit the flames/sparks...I assume that would be far too heavy for a civilian drone to carry.  also, i would like to state that my fiancee is a management official at a local health care facility, and she is far more skeptical about anything out of the ordinary than i am, and even she has no explanation for what they were, and was slightly shaken afterward.

ps: i have more photos and a couple very short videos that i am unable to attach, but none of them show any more detail than the ones i have attached below.  thank you so much for your time.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Multiple orb-like objects sighted, which at times trailed flames or sparks

content.detailedDescription:
We were standing on our pool deck, watching for and listening to the local fireworks displays around 9:30 pm.  approximately a few minutes after 10:00 pm, one of us spotted a light shining through the treetops to the ne, and then i saw it too.  we watched it for a minute or so.  at first we thought it might be a firework, some sort of light, or an airplane. the light was similar to a star, in that it was a round glowing shape, not defined with edges, but more of a floating light.  we laughed and said, "oh look, it is here to see the fireworks." then we stopped laughing as the light stopped moving, and we realized it wasn't an airplane at all.  it was pretty bright, and moving in a se direction, when it suddenly stopped and hovered for about 30 seconds or so.  we continued to watch it, then it began to fade which took about 10 seconds, and then blinked out.
it was neat to see, and once it faded, we lost interest in the fireworks and went inside the house.
i wanted to make sure that i wrote down what we saw as soon as possible so i looked up this site to track it, and see if anyone else saw it as well.
content.summary: Reddish-orange light moving in se direction, hovered, then faded.

content.detailedDescription:
The (presumably) same object was seen in two different locations at two different times by the same observer.

driving east on route 37 i spotted a rectangular object to the east. my position was near the intersection of hooper avenue on route 37 east near 149 route 37 east in toms river. the object was rectangular, white, and moving southward relative to my position. it was very small leading me to believe the object was a mile or two from my current position.

my first impression was "this was just a large banner someone's flying over the seaside heights beach". beach banners tend to be red letters on black netting, rather than presented as a large bedsheet. what convinced me to contact mufon was not seeing a plane towing it. my father-in-law was in the car with me, i remarked, "that's strange" but he was oblivious or thought i was talking about something else. before i approached the stop and shop on 353 route 37, the object was now low on the horizon and difficult to observe.

the distance between the two points is a little over a mile.

we made a stop and drove south down coolidge from bay avenue. while heading south on coolidge, and passing raider way, time approximately 17:05, i saw the white rectangle again. no plane was visible towing the object. after (maybe) two minutes, the object went behind trees while heading south. the rectangle was a bit larger from this vantage. the object was hidden by treetops before i reached the light on windsor ave. this time i pointed out the object to my father-in-law, he remarked "huh" but made no further comment.

i believe there's a chance this might've been a case of mistaken identity, this being a banner, but banners tend to be much longer rather than having the dimensions of a postcard. it's strange enough to report, and i'd like to know whether or not there's a prosaic explanation.
content.summary: Postcard in the sky

content.detailedDescription: I live by an arsenal i see things that most people don't see i have lived here my whole life i've seen objects my whole life many objects in a company by helicopter another aircraft but nothing ever makes me sound i watch many land over the years wash brite lites and certain procedure they do not make any sense to the normal person i do not report when they are doing their training which sounds like a lot of fire how many occasions or they do not admit to the gun battles that have happened in the office in its all good
content.summary: Watched unentified flying aircraft come over my house accompanied by helicopter is nothing made a sound

content.detailedDescription: Just finished dinner and walked out onto my deck to see if i could see any of the fireworks that i was hearing in the distance shoot above the treeline.  i live next to a 14 acre pond and woods surround us like a bowl. an airplane, or what i assume was an airplane caught my eye because it seemed to have an orange glow and the strobe lights seemed to flash orange. this is not the object i am reporting. just as i turned and  was about to enter the house i caught a black "spot" in the sky.  at first i could only see it with my peripheral vision while not looking directly at it.  it was moving from south-east to north-west. looking directly at it i saw nothing at first.  as it got closer i could see it directly and noticed a single orange light rotating around it's perimeter. my impression is that the light was stationary and the object was spinning. saw no structure or form...Just a dark round object blocking out the night sky.  i called for my wife to come out and she also saw the object just before it went out of sight above our roof line.
content.summary: Round object in night sky with one orange light rotating around it's perimeter.

content.detailedDescription: My son and i went to a church down the street that is positioned on a steep hill so we could watch fireworks. while we were watching them we started getting mosquito bites and while swatting them away we noticed a bright orange ball moving in the sky behind us. as it got closer it began to blink out. we had seen three of thees a year before from our back yard. a bit later we saw another one and it did the same. it was like it was lowing it's lights the gone. then a bit later we saw another on the same area but this time a plane (only know this because it made sound but had strange blinking white lights) was headed toward it and it blinked out. my son became very scared so we came home. while looking this up on my computer i saw another one and the plane again. on a side note, in an opposite direction we had seen a bright red light high in the sky with flashing lights in the middle. it hovered for a while and the went straight down and then hovered again. needless to say this was exciting for me but terrifying for my 12 year old son. we live 15 minutes from wright patt afb if that means anything.
content.summary: Observed four different orange objects in the sky.

content.detailedDescription: My friend and i were out on an evening motocycle  ride. we were on hwy 62 and spotted 3 bright orange equally spaced orbs traveling at various speeds. i pulled over to attemp to get pictures or videos they were to fast. my friend then spotted another one coming from different direction we reyes to video street lights and angle not good. proceeded in bike a minute later observed 2 more no luck with pictures or video. took off again and about a mile late saw anither one and followed it a couple miles before it moved quickly away to the south. circling around back to our home pulling in drive stopped and got a good video if one hovering over some fireworks going off not to far away. this orange orb then took off to the south. no others to report at this time.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Viewed orbs while motocycle riding got a nice video of one over house with eyewitness

content.detailedDescription: I was driving west on pulaski road in greenlawn ny. i am driving and watching the fireworks and i see two white lights in the sky near st. paraveski church. i thought it was the star of bethelhem so i pulled over to take a picture with my iphone. when i pulled over to take the picture i couldn't find the stars, because the lights disappeared. i thought the stars were under cloud cover so i went back into my car and continued to drive west on pulaski. i drove and turned near greenlawn memorial park where i saw the lights again. i pulled over and saw a couple in a white truck who pulled over looking up and taking pictures. i went into the park and walked away from the couple but in the sky was two curved white lights and the object was oval shape and jet black. it was so distinctive because the under belly of the object was very dark but you could see the contours of the object. it appeared two small planes were flying circles near the object and at a point i thought the two planes would collide in mid air. i assume thèy were looking at the object in the sky. i took pictures and tried taking videos but the object started to move north. as i was taking pictures the other couple in the white truck was leaving and i heard them say "oh good he is taking pictures of the same thing". the object was heading north with more pace so i ran to my car and chased after the object. it was about 1000 or 2000 feet from the ground as i was chasing. the object was graceful in the sky. i wished i had my camera at this point because the object was in full eyes view and i could see both white lights that spanned the object were curved with the object and a perfect white light. the lights moved with the object and you could notice the object was definately oval shape and jet black. there was traffic in the area and i was driving north to route 25a in huntington. i saw the object essentially pick up speed and with no resistance it glided and sped on a slight angle as it headed north and i lost tract of it. i have pictures of the object at the park but for some reason my iphone couldn't pick up what my eyes were seeing which is a shame.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: I was driving watching fireworks. i saw two lights and pulled over thinking it was star of bethel em ! it was not!!

content.detailedDescription:
There were plenty of fireworks in the sky; these were no fireworks. there were 5 slow moving lights that flew slowly in a nw direction. they appeared in about 2 minute intervals. one of them flew directly over us. probably about 2000 ft above, but there was no sound. when it was directly above i could see that it was circular and had 5-6 lights surrounding a red center. another that we were tracking in the distance, descended very quick towards the earth. within 10 minutes there was a helicopter searching the area. 
i saw a similar slow moving light at dusk about a month ago and was perplexed. it, like tonight's sighting, was flying at the same altitude as a helicopter, but there was no sound.
content.summary: 5 slow moving lights. circular with red lights. one descended rapidly.

content.detailedDescription: While observing neighborhood fireworks, the family noticed a consistent red light moving across the sky at a speed considerably faster than a jet aircraft at typical altitude for the area. once it traversed the sky and we were looking at it from behind, headed west, the red light disappeared and we were able to make out a circular silhouette where the light, or slightly above where the light would have been.  we knew it could not be any of the fireworks as it did not originate from the ground.  there were no visible navigation or landing lights accompanying it. it came into view from above the horizon/tree line and continued at a consistent altitude from a sse original position to a point west of our location.
content.summary: Red circle/sphere traversed a left to right path parallel to horizon

content.detailedDescription: I went outside around 9:50 pm on july 4th, 2015 on my front lawn in north tonawanda, ny to watch my neighbors fireworks. i looked up and saw a red/orange, large glowing, and pulsating at times, ball of light, no noise. at first i thought it was a stray fireworks, but it flew in a relatively straight pattern over my house. i watched it until i could no longer see it. possibly a drone? do they have glowing colored lights like that? really creepy. i have never witnessed a light like that flying at night.
content.summary: Round large object, red/orange, pulsating, flew over my house from west to east around 9:50 pm july 4th, 2015. i have never witnessed anything like it.

content.detailedDescription: at first i thought this was a plane but it flashed randomly and waved  abnormally left to right.  then disappeared
content.summary: at first i thought this was a plane but it flashed randomly and waved  abnormally left to right.  then disappeared

content.detailedDescription: We saw a duo with many bright colors on the bottom of it! it was about 3 a.M. downtown in the springtime about the year 2013! the metallic shape looked like a ghost shape that you would draw at halloween! it raced down horizontally right in front of us and down between two trees behind a brick building! that's all we saw!
content.summary: Sitting outside on 200 e. 400 s. at about 3 am. was shooting from the sky in a horizontal line with a lot of colors on the bottom of the duo!

content.detailedDescription: Two orbs lights ect glowing straight line slight turn straight then curved then just stopped ,gone then a white line as if the two eds of the line closed towards center.Its the fourth of july i don't know any fireworks that do that
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Bright red orange  lights glowing front then back diappeared whight flash as if it was light speed

content.detailedDescription:
Flying object with pulsating orange lights flew in from the northeast east
and made a 5 minute stop and quickly curved to the north and flew very
quickly into darkness after a shift in color from orange to pure white

i am at 21 foster street in whitesboro new york, 13492 and i was outside at a fire and i seen this object described above  very clearly,
right away i thought ufo bcuz no aircraft has orange lights and i am with 2 other witnesses, one of the witnesses is bob whiting who is at the same
address as the person who reported a ufo sighting last night around the same exact time
content.summary: Came from northeast east and curved quickly north after breif stop

content.detailedDescription: I was walking down the road,returning from a friend's house. most people in my village are asleep by this time. my road dips down on a preettty steep angle, going to a beach (hobart's beach) on the avon river. out of nowhere, comes this light, pulsating between a deep red and pure white high in the sky, about a mile over where the water would be. then, the thing exploded into 10 lights in a disc like hover, and flew right over me. then, they all combined and disappeared. i ran into my house, and called my sister, and she told me to come and fill out this form. then. i heard this bomb-like noise followed by a loud deep humming noise, like a ship's horn but way deeper. outside there was another red light, this time not pulsating, and it split into two, returned to one, and dived lightning fast into what would be the water. i then turned all the lights on in my house and hid in the bathroom. that is where i am as i write this.
content.summary: Weirdest lights in the sky, various colors

content.detailedDescription:
It started as i was coming back from getting oil i was coming down the road and as i went over a hill i saw a triangle in the sky it wasnt far away from me but it was high in the sky, i didnt know what to think i had never saw anything like it before. so at the next wide spot i pulled off and amed my head lights at it, it had red,blue,green,yellow,an whiteish lights around the edge of the object and black in the center.I sit there for a few minutes just watching it,it didnt move it wasnt making any sound,i thought to my self if i flash my headlights at itmay do something,so i begain to flash my head lights at it, and it did nothing so i started to leave but before i did i thought i would try it one more time. and as i started to flash my lights it started brighting an diming back,to be honest that excited me! so i decided to get underneath it because it wasnt far away just high in the sky so i took off to get under it i went about a mile an seen 3 people standing beside there car looking at it. as i passed them i saw a road to the right that i thought would put me underneath it but it a dead end road that went into the woods next to a field so i stopped an got out and then started through brush because i had lost sight of it in the trees an brush. but as i got to the clearing were the field was i saw a light blue light that covered a field that was on the other side of a creek from the field i was coming in,it was like the light was coming out of pure blackness it looked darker behind the beam than everywhere else so i bent down to crawl under the bobwire that was around the field but as i got up the light was gone, so i looked up to see if i could see the triangle and was there so i walked in the fieldto get under it,so when i got as close as i could i remembered that i just bought a lighter so i got it out an lit it and started moving it left to right it never done anything so i started making differnt shapes it never moved until i made a circle, an when i did it bobbingan moving left to right and then it stoped so i did it again but this time when started bobbing iseen it was getting closer and a light blinked on beside it. it would blink off an on and every time it blinked on in different spot in the blink of an eye it would do that an as i was watching all of the sudden a light just blinked on to the left of me not a foot above the trees beside me i could have hit it with a rock, it was about 10 or 15 foot high an4 foot wide it was like it just fliped on it was bright but didnt shine it was like it was contained inside the shape it was in you could fantly see the leaves on the top of the tree but the funnyest thing about it was that i couldnt move i couldnt take my eyes off it all i could do is move my eyes as it moved toward town and when it moved far enough away i could move again an when i could i looked up to see if the other thing was still there but to my surprize there wasnt just one any more there wereat least 15 triangles and eachone had a light around it,it was like a star beside eachone that blinked on an off around eachone. an at this time when i saw this a fear came over me to this day i dont know why but i was terrorfied
so i started running toward my truck, when i got to my truck i got in an started leaving when i got to the top of the hill i stuck my head out to see if i could see them behind me, an they were. i took my side mirror an pointed up to keep sight of them, when i got home which was only 2 miles give or take.When i got home i ran in the house to tell my wife what had happened she said where have you been its 1.00am in the morning, to me i know i was just gone for 1 mabe 1 an a half hours not no 5 hours i told her what had happened an that thay have followed me here i got my flashlight an went outsideto see if thay were still there but what i saw was different. it looked like a scalene triangle and it was redish orange and right over my home but high in the sky i took my light an pointed it at them an tried to see if thay would follow the light, some would and others wouldnt it was :amazing: as i was doing this my wife was hanging out the window looking an then all of the sudden it was like glitter falling to my right i turned to my wife an said did you see that she said yea but as fast as the glitter started it stoped.And at that moment i saw a bright light and it was no ordnary light and it was right over the four lane across from were i live an i have to say it was very big!!Lie the size of a two story house not moving no sound i took my flashlight an started flashing it toward it an as i did it changed shapes from a circle, to a circle with two legs on the bottom an when i flashed it again it went back to a circle what made the light also stange was that it looked like liquid inside and it was constantly moving i got excited an jumped in my truck an started toward it as i did a redish,orange ball of light came at me about the size of a beachball i rammed my breaks on because i thought it was going to hit me,but right at that moment it took a sharp left turn an started zig zagging around the houses going east.After i lost sight of it i started to the light again but when i got closer it started backing up an when i got as close as i could to it it stoped it was like it knew i couldnt get any closer without going in the woods. so i just bent down an watched it.I knelt there for about 30 mins until i had to leave because i had to go to work the next morning. and it stayed there til i went to bed, an when i got up the next morning i opened the curtain to just see if it was still there, at first i seen nothing but as i looked around i saw a plane going acoss the sky,right above where i had saw the light the night before as i was looking at it i saw a black line going stright up if i would have held my hand up to see the distance from the plane to the black line it would have been about two and a half inchs the plane was about 3,8ths of an inch long an the black line was around 2 inchs long i am trying to give you an idea of how high it was in the sky and how much bigger the black line was frm the plane and i am not for sure if the plain was a fighter jet or a passenger jet because it was so high in the sky but if it was a passenger jet what ever the black line was that was going toward space had to be over a mile long.But thats my assumption.And then i had to leave to go to work an that was the last of the sighting...But i also want to say after this event, its like memories came flooding in, of past events that had happen in my life even from when i was real small,... the reason why i am telling you this is that mabe you can help me because i have not been the same since!! and i hope you can help me find answers an not think i am :crazy: like everyone else i have told this too!! thank you so very much! and i hope to hear from you.But if not thanks anyway. ronald owens...
content.distance: 20 Feet or Less, 101-500 Feet, Over 1 Mile, Unknown
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering,Other
content.summary: A life altering event,that has chaged me,and brought back mimories of other events that had happend when i was younger.

content.detailedDescription:
I was attending the ci agent course at ft. huachuca army intelligence school.  the entire class was outside of the classroom bulding for an extended break in between sessions.  most of us were at the food truck, but there were a few people at the corner of the building looking at the sky and remarking "wow!  what is that?!"  "whoa, that's so weird", and similar.  

i went to see what they were looking at, and there was a strange object that appeared to be travelling through the sky by folding itself inside of itself.  i had never seen anything like it.  we were all pretty amazed, but, to be honest, we were all young, and just being exposed to classified information, and ufos were really common at fort huachuca, so we didn't really discuss it any further.

within a year of this incident, most of us at the school witnessed numerous ufos, myself included.  i also had several abduction dreams around this time.

clean bill of mental health, or else they wouldn't have given me the security clearance.  never saw this object before, or after.
content.summary: Strange folding shape with multiple witnesses above ft. huachuca

content.detailedDescription: Just letting dog out for toilet when i noticed a very bright orange, red light in the sky.  it was hovering then began to move slowly across the sky it was not that high up.  there was no noise like you have with a plane and it's lights seemed very bright orange red like diamond shape.  i did not have time to grab my phone to get a picture but is was definitely not a plane!!
content.summary: Moving very slowly hovering with silence not a plane!!
